instruction: Find a Twitter post from an account with over 100,000 followers.
output:
This tweet from Elon Musk, CEO of SpaceX and Tesla, with over 36 million followers:
"The world's most advanced AI is already here. Neuralink will be incredible for augmenting human capabilities and helping people with neurological conditions. Read about it: https://t.co/sF3yRY3qCq"
